comments_since_last_sample.body: This is absolutely stunning! I love any kind of wash on wood it’s just so stylish! You are killing the furniture game!

I Wasn’t convinced about this piece up until your reveal…looks amazing! The hardware, i feel, definitely made it way more modern and appealing. Once I saw the chipping on the old paint, i would have used a chemical stripper to get off the top coat and most paint, wipe off remaining stripper, let dry, then sanded it. Sounds like the sanding process was painfully long!
Outstanding job Christina! I love the updated clean lines and the black! So chic! Awesome 👏🏻
I love this one! Absolutely stunning! 😍😍😍
Hi there, love your work but I do have a question.. if we used oil base wood paint can I use a water base finish?
Love the restyle. Can you tell me if it’s the camera that makes the black wash patchy? Especially on the sides? I’m hoping it’s the camera as I’d love to try the black wash.
Looks epic Christina! I’m a real fan of the paint wash look.
